cyclone.name: NICOLE
cyclone.current_location: about 350 mi NE of the northwestern Bahamas
cyclone.trajectory: Moving west toward the northwestern Bahamas, then turning WNW to approach the east-central Florida coast, before recurving northwest and north-northwest across Florida into southern Georgia late Thursday-Friday
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: east-central Florida coast (near the Boca Ratonâ€“Volusia County stretch)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch: Hallandale Beach FL to Boca Raton FL and Flagler/Volusia County Line FL to Ponte Vedra Beach FL; Tropical Storm Watch: Altamaha Sound GA to Savannah River GA and portions of south FL Gulf coast
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning: Boca Raton FL to Flagler/Volusia County Line FL and parts of the northwestern Bahamas; Tropical Storm Warning: Hallandale Beach FL to Boca Raton FL, Flagler/Volusia County Line FL to Altamaha Sound GA, Lake Okeechobee and parts of the northwestern Bahamas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northwestern Bahamas, east-central & northern Florida coast, southeastern Georgia, eventually the Carolinas and Mid-Atlantic coast
